name: egocentrically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you think only about yourself and what is good for you: He tends to spend his additional income egocentrically. We see objects and places egocentrically, with our own position as the starting point. See
egocentric
More examplesFewer examplesThe psychologist Jean Piaget claimed children under seven think egocentrically and have great difficulty taking the viewpoint of others.He was egocentrically concerned with only his own future.She believes that women see themselves a little less egocentrically compared with men.
